modules.langchain: Used in RAG chain construction and QA pipeline.
modules.llamaindex: Optional or used for document parsing/embedding.
modules.neo4j: Graph relationships, if used for metadata/context linkage.
modules.milvus: Vector store backend for document embeddings.
modules.fastapi: Serves API endpoints for retrieval and user input.
modules.pytest: Handles automated testing for RAG flows and logic.
